data.text: The scripture says, “Don’t get weary in well-doing, for in due season, you will reap if you faint not.” God says, if you won’t get tired of doing the right thing, if you won’t let what you don’t see talk you out of what you know, then your due season is coming.

If you only invest in people at your same level, you'll get stuck there. Find a mentor, somebody that's gone where you want to go.

Get a copy of Joel’s NEW book “Empty Out The Negative” for you and a friend here: https://t.co/LJKn1wR4Eh

#EmptyOutTheNegativeBook 
#JoelOsteen https://t.co/o4iTthrUQ7

You can’t put poison in your spirit and live a faith-filled life. Let it go; that’s over and done.

Don't miss this powerful message, "A Fresh New Attitude" from Joel!  https://t.co/kMfAhXGqHJ

God has the last word. He overrides what’s trying to stop you. The opposition, the people against you, they have a say. They may set you back, but really, they’re setting you up. The more they pull you back, the further God is going to take you. He has the final say.

Bitterness will keep you from your destiny. It’s going to pull you down into depression, steal your dreams, and rob you of your joy. You may have a good reason to be bitter, somebody hurt you, but holding on to the hurt is only going to make it worse.

The one thing you can always control is your attitude. If you’re not proactive, if you don’t choose to have the right attitude, then the wrong attitude will show up.

Be inspired by this message from Joel, "A Fresh New Attitude". Check it out: https://t.co/KpspxxmnN3 https://t.co/XHBUKLb7n1

If you’ll stay in faith, at some point, you’re going to see what God was doing behind the scenes. Suddenly, things will fall into place. Suddenly, you’ll meet the right person. Suddenly, your business will take off.

Let go of the disappointments of the past; let go of what didn’t work out. Get your mind going in the right direction. Make the decision, “I’m going to see the good today. I’m going to be kind to others. I’m going to stay in faith and enjoy this day.”

God is in control. He's directing your steps, and at the right time, what has your name on it will show up.

Get a copy of Joel’s NEW book “Empty Out The Negative” for you and a friend here: https://t.co/LJKn1wR4Eh

#EmptyOutTheNegativeBook
#JoelOsteen https://t.co/HUpXIJ0Sa0

Yesterday’s attitude will get old. If you don’t start fresh and new, then you’ll bring all of the negative from yesterday into today.

Click here to watch, "A Fresh New Attitude": https://t.co/kMfAhXGqHJ https://t.co/H4rNhrm1Vy
Reliving old hurts, thinking about what you lost, will keep you down. Let it go. Put on a fresh new attitude, and you’ll begin to rise to new heights.
Try being kind, considerate, pleasant to be around. You’ll not only enjoy life more, but you’ll go further and people will treat you better.

You can’t change other people. You can’t change your circumstances, how you were raised, who your parents are, but you can change your attitude.

Listen now to this message from Joel, "A Fresh New Attitude": https://t.co/KpspxxmnN3 https://t.co/oXmYEPP02S

Too often, we’re holding on to hurts, disappointments, things we don’t understand. This poisons our attitude, takes our passion, makes us negative & critical. You have to let it go. Quit going back to it. It’s over and done. Move forward.
The scripture says, “Rain falls on the just and the unjust.” No one is exempt from difficulties. But if you’ll stay in faith, that setback is setting you up for God to show out in your life.

Your attitude can make up for a lack of experience, a lack of training, a lack of talent.

Tune into Joel’s message today! "A Fresh New Attitude"  https://t.co/KpspxxmnN3 https://t.co/UdLE3sPeZs

Get up every morning and put on a fresh new attitude. This day is a gift from God. It’s filled with possibilities, with new ideas, new friendships. Stay focused on the good, focused on the possibilities.

Don’t be hard-headed. You’re doing yourself a disservice to go through a painful time and not come out with what you were supposed to gain. There’s a lesson in the pain. Don’t keep repeating the same mistakes.

God parted Red Seas, He opened blind eyes, He brought water out of a rock, He caused Isaac to prosper in a famine, Sarah to have a baby at eighty years old, four lepers to defeat a huge army. He knows how to get you to your destiny.

Yes, we’ve all made mistakes, but you don’t have to pay God back. The price has already been paid. Receive His forgiveness; receive His mercy. You have enough people in life against you; don’t be against yourself.

You’re not just anyone; you belong to the Most High God. When you know who you are, you live from a place of faith, a place of trust, a place of confidence.

Check out "Remember Who You Are" on Podcast here! https://t.co/KpspxxmnN3 https://t.co/TYbexJUSnl

You’re going to see God override what’s trying to stop you. There’s no storm too strong that He can’t calm. No giant too big that He can’t defeat. No fire too hot that He can’t step into and bring you out.

Give the perfect gift this Christmas!

Get a copy of Joel’s NEW book “Empty Out The Negative” for you and a friend here: https://t.co/LJKn1wR4Eh

#EmptyOutTheNegativeBook
#JoelOsteen https://t.co/nw7za0g9C6

Cultivate a lifestyle of being thankful, of remembering what God has done and how blessed you are. Let us know what you are thankful for this year. Wishing you and your family a blessed Thanksgiving! https://t.co/gGjVyWvf53
Focus on the good; be grateful for what you have. Life will be so much more rewarding if you’re content in every season.

If you're not proactive, if you don't choose the right attitude, then the wrong attitude will show up.

Get a copy of Joel’s NEW book “Empty Out The Negative” for you and a friend here: https://t.co/LJKn1wR4Eh 

#EmptyOutTheNegativeBook
#JoelOsteen https://t.co/C2LuTZBpdv

When you understand that you belong to Him, then you can live from a place of peace, knowing that God is going to protect you. He is going to show you favor; He is going to turn that problem around.

Watch, "Remember Who You Are" from Joel!  https://t.co/KpspxxmnN3 https://t.co/X3nJvJPudn

Your time is coming. The enemy doesn’t control your doors; people don’t control your doors. Fear, depression, addictions don’t control your doors. The Most High God is your doorkeeper. He’s in control of what opens and what closes.

Quit worrying; quit losing sleep. God has you in the palm of His hand. He never asked you to figure out the how. In fact, the scripture says, “Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not to your own understanding.”

Keep your heart pure. If you do this, you're going to step up to a new level with more joy, more peace, and more favor.

Get a copy of Joel’s NEW book “Empty Out The Negative” for you and a friend here: https://t.co/LJKn1wR4Eh

#EmptyOutTheNegativeBook
#JoelOsteen https://t.co/4uLfHOsnY6

When God created you, He put His blessing on you. He put His favor on you. Quit trying to figure out all the hows and rest in the Who.

Click here to watch, "Remember Who You Are": https://t.co/kMfAhXGqHJ https://t.co/BMrjjExcrq

God already has a solution to that problem that is stressing you out. He has angels watching over you. He has favor surrounding you. He’s put a blessing on your life that circumstances and people cannot stop.
If you stay focused on how, you’re going to live worried, discouraged. Your job is not to figure everything out; your job is to honor God, be your best, and He will take care of the how.

You have to shift your perspective from the how to the who. Who you are is more powerful than any force that’s trying to stop you.

Listen now to this new message from Joel, "Remember Who You Are": https://t.co/KpspxxmnN3 https://t.co/dk8aYOqOsm
God is going to put dreams in your heart that seem impossible. Obstacles will come that look too big, enemies too strong. The how is not up to you. The power of the Most High is going to work it out.

Take the pressure off yourself. Quit living worried, frustrated. It’s not going to be by your strength, by your ability, but by the Spirit of the living God.

Tune into Joel’s new message today! "Remember Who You Are"  https://t.co/KpspxxmnN3 https://t.co/RyDpJs55C4

You may have made mistakes, but that’s not who you are; that’s what you did. You are still a son, a daughter of the Most High. You are forgiven, redeemed, restored, called, equipped, chosen, and anointed.

Here’s the key: the how is not as important as the who. When you know who you are, a child of the Most High God, crowned with favor, with royal blood flowing through your veins, then the who will override the how.
God is working. The promise is growing. What God spoke to you is developing. You may not see anything improving, but if you’ll stay in faith, what God said is on the way.
